Infantry Captain.name: Infantry Captain
Infantry Captain.text: Do up to 2 combat moves, using your pieces other than the Infantry Captain.

Chronicler.name: Chronicler
Chronicler.text: Upgrade 1 of your common pieces other than the Chronicler. Then that piece may do a standard move.

Gun Tower.name: Gun Tower
Gun Tower.text: You may choose 1 of the indicated directions: Destroy the first 2 pieces in that direction. A legendary piece cannot be destroyed and stops the shot.

Knight.name: Knight
Knight.text: The Knight may do up to 3 combat moves. You cannot destroy common pieces with these moves.

Cannon.name: Cannon
Cannon.text: You may choose 1 of the indicated directions: Destroy all common pieces in that direction.

Messenger.name: Messenger
Messenger.text: You may choose 1 of your non-legendary pieces and a direction. That piece may do any number of standard moves in that direction.

Herald.name: Herald
Herald.text: Do up to 2 moves, using only your pieces. These moves can only be onto empty squares.

Champion.name: Champion
Champion.text: You may destroy 1 adjacent enemy piece. If that piece was legendary, you also destroy the Champion and gain an action.

Summoner.name: Summoner
Summoner.text: You may place up to 2 common pieces of your color on empty marked squares.

Cavalry Captain.name: Cavalry Captain
Cavalry Captain.text: You may choose 1 of your pieces other than the Cavalry Captain: You may do up to 1 combat move and up to 2 standard moves with it (in any order).

Bomb.name: Bomb
Bomb.text: If summoning the Bomb is your last action this turn, nothing happens ; otherwise, destroy the Bomb and all common pieces adjacent to it.

Master of Intrigue.name: Master of Intrigue
Master of Intrigue.text: Do up to 3 moves: standard moves with the Master of Intrigue and/or combat moves using non-legendary pieces that were used to summon him.

High Priestess.name: High Priestess
High Priestess.text: The High Priestess may do 1 standard move. Whether she moves or not, you may then upgrade 1 common piece adjacent to her.

Hypnotist.name: Hypnotist
Hypnotist.text: You may choose up to 3 common or up to 2 heroic pieces in one enemy color: Do 1 combat move with each.

Gryphon Rider.name: Gryphon Rider
Gryphon Rider.text: The Gryphon Rider may do a combat leap. If she does, you may then downgrade her and place 1 common piece of your color on an empty adjacent space.

Assassin.name: Assassin
Assassin.text: Destroy any piece on the marked square. If the marked square was empty, the Assassin may move onto it.

Time Mage.name: Time Mage
Time Mage.text: Gain an action. If there is an enemy piece on the marked square, destroy it.

Swordmaster.name: Swordmaster
Swordmaster.text: You may destroy 1 common enemy piece on a diagonally adjacent square. If you do, upgrade the Swordmaster.
